abstract: More than 100 people connected to Central Californian gangs are arrested as part of California Department of Justice's 18-month effort to curb street gangs.
snippet: More than 100 people, almost all of them connected to Central California gangs, were arrested this week in the latest effort to curb street gangs, Attorney General Kamala Harris announced.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 people, almost all of them connected to Central California gangs, were arrested this week in the latest effort to curb street gangs, Attorney General Kamala Harris announced.

headline.seo: California Gang Crackdown Leads to More than 100 Arrests
